short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides all but the top seven stories on Hacker News.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You need to browse Hacker News less.  Instead of going cold turkey, why not exercise moderation?

This extension hides all but the first seven links on HN's front page.  It also hides the link to the next page.
